what products do you offer?: We offer pizzas, burgers, salads and cold drinks.
what burgers do you offer?: We offer Big Mac, Quarter Pounder with Cheese, Cheeseburger and Hamburger
what salads do you offer?: Bacon Ranch Salad and Side Salad
what cold drinks do you offer?: We offer Coca-Cola, Sprite, Fanta Orange and DASANI Water
do you have any sausages avaliable?: We do have, ketchup, garlic sausage and mustard!
what pizzas do you offer?: We offer: Margherita Pizza, White Pizza, Caesar Salad Pizza, Waffled Margherita Pizza, Venetian Rolled Pizza, Pizza Pockets, Calzone Pizza, Griddled California pizzas, Bruschetta Pizzaiola, Breakfast Pizza, Gluten-Free Mushroom Pizza, Wingless Buffalo Chicken Pizza and Basic Pepperoni Pizza
